page.title: 03ST.MARY'S CHURCH
page.content: ST.MARY'S CHURCH WAS BUILT 800 YEARS AGO.THE PARISH SPREADS FOR 3 1/2 MILES FROM NORTH TO SOUTH.IT IS OFF THE MAIN ROAD IN A PASTORAL SETTING. THE CHURCH IS STILL IN USE ALTHOUGH IT HAS NO RESIDENT MINISTER. IT IS DESCRIBED IN THE ST.MARYS' CHURCH HISTORY AND GUIDE AS BEING"A GREATLY CHERISHED BUILDING.....WHERE PEOPLE OF ALL FAITHS OR OF NONE MAY FIND PEACE AND BEAUTY.." MAINTENANCE OF THE BUILDING IS COSTLY AND THE BUILDING IS SHOWING SIGNS OF DETERIORATION. THE OLDEST ARCHITECTURAL FEATURES OF THE CHURCH PROBABLY DATE BACK TO 1208. THE CORE OF THE NAVE AND CHANCEL DATE FROM THAT TIME AND THERE WAS A CHURCH ON THE SITE IN THE 13th CENTURY ACCORDING TO PARISH RECORDS.
